DOC.detailed_description: The stepwise process leukocyte extravasation inflame tissue depend expression variety cytokine adhesion molecule . Recently much attention focus Junctional Adhesion Molecules ( JAM ) . The three member adhesion molecule family , namely , JAM-A , -B -C , show govern last step leukocyte extravasation ( transmigration ) - process leukocytes pass endothelial cell . In addition transmigration , member family seem support additional step leukocyte extravasation cascade . We recently show , antibody-mediated inhibition JAM-C significantly reduce hapten induced skin inflammation ( J Invest Dermatol ; 125 ( 5 ) :969 ) . Recent unpublished work laboratory show , JAM-C expression lymphocytes up-regulated specific activator . Hence , hypothesize , JAM-C expression elevate patient psoriasis .
